entry.title: WINTER STORM WATCH , Sarnia
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:59 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, 4.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sarnia Chris Hadfield Airport 10:00 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023
Condition: Partly Cloudy
Temperature: 4.5°C
Pressure: 99.9 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 49 %
Dewpoint: -5.4°C
Wind: W 41 km/h gust 59 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3
